oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An iterative Shimizu non-aldol approach for the stereoselective synthesis of C13-C22 fragment of callystatin A
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PUJARI, SA
KALIAPPAN, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: POTENT CYTOTOXIC POLYKETIDE
CLOSING METATHESIS APPROACH
ASYMMETRIC TOTAL-SYNTHESIS
ENANTIOSELECTIVE TOTAL-SYNTHESIS
FORMAL TOTAL-SYNTHESIS
C-ARYL GLYCOSIDES
MARINE SPONGE
CALLYSPONGIA-TRUNCATA
ABSOLUTE STEREOSTRUCTURE
BIOLOGICAL EVALUATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient synthesis of the polypropionate framework of callystatin A has been achieved by utilizing the Shimizu reaction in an iterative fashion.
